DKAN2: Open Source Data Catalog
===============================

This is the central site for technical/developer documentation of DKAN2. 
DKAN2 is a Drupal 8-based open data portal and catalog.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :hidden: 
   :caption: Contents:

   introduction/index
   installation/index
   components/index
   api/index
   community/index
   development/index
   license
   about

Additional resources
--------------------

- `DKAN Home <http://getdkan.com>`_: Central portal for the DKAN community.
- `Drupal Documentation <https://www.drupal.org/documentation>`_
- `CKAN <https://ckan.org/>`_: Open-source data portal that is the inspiration for DKAN
